bio.title: Research Interests
bio.body: Computer Vision, Representation learning, Natural Language Understanding

events.title: New York University, NY
events.subtitle: Master of Science (Data Science)
events.desc:
• Relevant Coursework: Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing, Reinforcement Learning, Machine Learning, Variational Inference, Big Data, Optimization, Probability and Statistics
• Teaching Assistant for Deep Learning (Yann LeCun), Computer Vision (Rob Fergus), Machine Learning (David Rosenberg), and Introduction to Data Science (Brian D’alessandro)

events.title: Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee, India
events.subtitle: B. Tech., Major: Mechanical Engg, Minor: Computer Science
events.desc: • Relevant Coursework: Design and Analysis of Algorithms, Data Structures, Database Management Systems, Discrete Structures, Computer Architecture and Microprocessors, Numerical Optimization, Numerical Algorithms, Calculus

events.title: TripAdvisor LLC
events.subtitle: Machine Learning Scientist Intern (Experiences & Rentals)
events.desc:
• Built models to automatically map 100k+ products on Viator with their relevant attractions on TripAdvisor
• Final 3-class classification NLP model comprising fuzzy string matching similarities, n-gram similarities (soft-tfidf, monge-elkan) and features based on Named Entity Recognition and truncated SVD achieved accuracy of 83%
• Impressions-to-bookings list-wise learning-to-rank (LTR) model to sort order of products gave MRR of 0.58 and mAP@5 of 0.6

events.title: Fuzzy Logix LLC
events.subtitle: Data Scientist Intern (North Carolina Team)
events.desc:
• Developed apps and interactive visualizations for regression, classification, and clustering algorithms on Teradata AppCenter
• Applied ensembles to analyze datasets in diverse domains and derived key business insights for better returns

events.title: AdWyze (Official Marketing Partner of Facebook)
events.subtitle: Data Scientist and Software Developer Intern
events.desc:
• Contributed to automated data handling and predictive modeling of Facebook ad budget strategies
• Increased short-term revenues for AdWyze and its clients by nearly 3% based on recommendations from predictions
• Made significant contributions to ad campaign bulk edits, reduced the loading time of pages, etc.

events.title: Neural Machine Translation System
events.subtitle: Prof. Kyunghyun Cho, New York University and Facebook AI Research
events.desc:
• Built NMT system for translating Chinese (zh) to English (en) and Vietnamese (vi) to English
• Used bidirectional LSTM and Convolutional neural networks for encoder-decoder architecture with Luong attention mechanism
• Best model attained BLEU scores of 24 and 19 with Beam Search on IWSLT 2015 vi → en and zh → en datasets

events.title: Visual Embeddings for Reinforcement Learning
events.subtitle: Prof. Rob Fergus, New York University and Facebook AI Research
events.desc:
• Trained RL agent to solve hard exploration mazes by watching few expert demonstration videos
• Used self-supervised Computer Vision task to generate embeddings and used them to guide agent via Imitation Learning

events.title: Generatively Removing Photobomers
events.subtitle: Prof. Yann LeCun, New York University and Facebook AI Research
events.desc:
• Developed a pipeline to efficiently remove photobombers in images and replace them with background
• Model used Mask-RCNN using Facebook’s Detectron for instance segmentation and Deep Image Prior for inpainting

events.title: Toxic Comment Classification
events.subtitle: Prof. David S. Rosenberg, New York University
events.desc:
• Built multi-class multi-label models to classify Wikipedia comments into different levels of toxicity and profanity
• Achieved macro-AUC of 0.98 with fastText; 0.97 with ensemble of XGBoost and Naive-Bayes SVM (self-implemented)

data.content:
• Computer Languages: Python, C++, Java, R, SQL, Ruby, JavaScript (Node, Angular, D3), Shell scripting, Git, LaTeX

• Tools and Technologies: PyTorch, TensorFlow, scikit-learn, Spark, Hive, Hadoop, Google BigQuery, OpenAI Gym, TensorBoard

• Scholarships: KVPY Fellowship from IISc Bangalore, Coca-Cola Scholarship (Chemistry), C.V. Narasimhan Scholarship (Physics)

• Co-/Extra-curricular Activities: Co-founded Data Science Group at IIT-R to conduct lectures, research talks, etc.; Ranked in top 10 in several ML competitions on AnalyticsVidhya; Head of Department at Team KNOx (Automobile Manufacturing Group)
